skills: React, TypeScript, GitLab, Firebase, Figma, Notion, Agility
description: As an intern at Reactional Music, I worked on an application for music composers, and I developed some features like settings page, login to a reactional account or management of themes. This application allows composers to create and share their music themes for video games.
I worked as a ventilation fitter during my summer holidays. I learned to work in a team and to adapt to different situations.
